name: Autumn MUST DIE
description:
Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Space to Jump

Shift or Z to Shoot

F or X to Charge Shoot

E or C to Interact

Esc to Pause

Story:

You are an agent of the summaritans who have waged war against the autuminions for decades

Your boss has sent you in to end the fight once and for all by defeating the autuminions greatest leaders and stop autumn from coming forever

Credits:

Everything in the game was made by me in Godot and Pyxel Edit

The theme was Cozy Autumn for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam hosted by Firith Studios
